snippet: In a new series of portraits of Chinese factory workers, the French photographer Lucas Schifres examines some of the otherwise anonymous people who produce so many of the everyday products that are now manufactured in China and used all over the...
abstract: In a new series of portraits of Chinese factory workers, the French photographer Lucas Schifres examines some of the otherwise anonymous people who produce so many of the everyday products that are now manufactured in China and used all over the world.

headline.main: Putting a Face on China Inc.
